ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Classic
ygData.msgSnippet: I d play there as an alt server...something to do when my main server is down or no one s on and I can t find anything appealing to do. As for main server? No
ygData.messageBody:
I'd play there as an alt server...something to do when my main server is
down or no one's on and I can't find anything appealing to do.

As for main server? No way. I'm not exactly uber and by no means spoiled,
but I clawed my way OUT of having cruddy gear and not having 2 CP to rub
together. I wouldn't choose to return to it as more than a way to kill time.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Greg" <freechylde@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 13, 2005 6:13 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Classic


> Hey Kids...Been gone awhile...been busy..
>
> Anyway, in talking to my old EQ chums and with what I read on the
> websites, there is/has been some talk about SOE making a "classic"
> server.
>
> Now the "classic" server would be EQ prior to PoP, no adds or toys,
> with the exception of the stuff necessary. This would mean no PoK, no
> Guild Lobby, etc.
>
> Knowing that many of you have been here since around Beta or just after
> and that most of you can honestly say " I remember when... or Back in
> the Day we had to run from X t Y and it was 4 day run...."; I am
> curious to know if any of you kids would use such a server, or have you
> all become stuck on how things are now that going back to the old way
> would kill the game for you?
>
> As always, but now just plainly nosey..
>
> Greg
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
